reviews.text: Great food and service!
Best

THE WAITERS WERE EXTREMELY  NICE FOOD DELICIOUS
ALL AROUND &AROUND
Delicious food, relaxing environment
Great place for a brunch before the beach or a meal on your way back.
We just went to the Bay Cafe with whole family and the food was amazing!!! Amazing service!!! 5 stars highly recommended!!!
Went with the family. Service impeccable. Food was next level. We will be back
Came in for a late lunch and really enjoyed the meal, service and atmosphere.
Luis was an awesome waiter

If your looking for an excellent dairy restaurant with great food, beautiful atmosphere and excellent service The Bay Caf√© is the place to go. For any occasion: family outings,  celebrations or  date nights. Luis is an excellent server- very attentive and friendly. Highly recommend the fish tacos, cauliflower poppers, khachapuri, and cannelloni. Additonally, they are very accommodating to dietary restrictions and allergies.  Be sure to check it out:)
just placed a delivery order & she gave me the best service on the phone üòäo nice that was fantastic!!!!
We enjoyed the food and atmosphere!!
Excellent gracious waitress
Louise and the rest of the staff are excellent as always, every time I come here I don‚Äôt think they could top themselves and they always do. Really excellent place!!!
Food is good and kosher
Amazing food great atmosphere, Luis with great hospitality and service!

Would have given this place 10 stars if I could! The food was excellent üëå, the service impeccable and vibes were great!
Can't wait to go back - especially for the mushroom truffle pizza - yam!!!

"One cannot think well, love well, sleep well, if one has not dined well." ‚Äì Virginia Woolf

Bay Caf√© in Brooklyn is proof of that. Whether you sit outside by the water or inside in the cozy dining room, the atmosphere makes you feel instantly at ease. We enjoyed a glass of vino to start, followed by dishes that played with the taste buds in all the right ways‚Äîthe flaky, perfectly cooked sea bass, rich truffle mushroom pizza, fresh tiradito de tuna, crispy fish tempura, and a simple yet flawless spaghetti pomodoro. The decadent Dubai chocolate dessert was the ideal sweet finale. Great and attentive service, warm hospitality from owner Larisa, and flavors you‚Äôll think about long after you leave. After dinner, a walk around the bay is the perfect ending to a wonderful evening.

Terrible place! Ordered two desserts ‚Äì the ‚ÄòDubai chocolate‚Äô was just two tiny pieces with green filling, not pistachio, with a bland, awful taste. $18 for that! The $19 lemon pie was plain cream cheese in a cup with sour lemon, no crust, nothing on the side. Both coffees were awful. Rip-off ‚Äì avoid!

Luis was the best
Waffles were yummy
And we can't forget about Luis
An absolute legend
Great food every time we go there
Fantastic ambience! Excellent service with a sincere smile! The food was superb as well!
Amazing meal tonight. Great service. Lovely ambiance!
Great food with exceptional service. Louis was very helpful and patient. The food was tasty, well presented and the portions were large. Overall great experience!
Fish was not fresh first time I went. Gave it another try and mac and cheese tasted like mouth full of American cheese slices
Our server,  Kutay was excellent
The guy was very nice.
Delicious good, great service!

It was my birthday, my family surprised me at this restaurant. This is the most delicious and delightful experience that I had. The Tuna dish was amazing. Never had that anywhere. I recommend this restaurant to anyone if you like good food and great service.
Fantastic clean delicious restaurant.
I had the most pleasant lunch at bay cafe, from their kind staff to dishes and drinks made to perfection, highly recommended!

Beyond impressed. We had an event at the Jewish Center close by and looked for a place for dinner prior. Found this gem. They cater to the locals and their business is strong. They have indoor and outdoor seating. The servers know the menu well and are very kind and fast and keep the place spotless. Fish was excellent as was the salad and hand made pasta. Everything was fresh and played nicely. A little expensive for the fare but worth the extra money for quality food/service and preparation.

An Unforgettable Birthday Celebration!

We recently celebrated our twins' 4th birthday at this incredible restaurant, and the experience was nothing short of amazing! The food was abundant, hot, and absolutely delicious‚Äîevery guest was impressed by the variety and quality.

The staff was attentive, friendly, and truly made us feel welcome throughout the entire event. The owner went above and beyond to ensure everything ran smoothly, doing everything she could to make sure we were happy and comfortable.

We had 45 guests, and I had arranged for both a photographer and an entertainment team to join us. The owner did everything possible to support us and help coordinate, always with a smile and a helping hand.

The atmosphere was warm and festive, and every little detail was taken care of. It was clear that this team truly cares about their guests and takes pride in creating memorable experiences.

This event exceeded all our expectations‚Äîwe couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better place to celebrate such a special day. Highly, highly recommended!
The place was lovely and clean and our waiter was professional and lovely. Will definitely go back!!
Tatia is fantastic.  Clean beautiful inviting.
I was there Thursday with my whole family, excellent everything, Pnina Siovnov party was great!!!
The fish is outstanding !
I cried eating the khachapuri. Amazing kosher food.
Nice clean outdoor dinning are. Food presentation was good. Fettuccine Alfredo with mushrooms was good. The wild mushrooms risotto was a lite salty. Overall experience was good.
Great food! Great experience! Luis is an amazing waiter!
excellent service I recommend to everyone very good staff very good specialists I am very satisfied
Loius was a great server! He was friendly and attentive!

Great place with Moderate prices, nice friendly atmosphere and great service
Luis gave us great service with s smile
Leeis helped us tremendously!!!

The only place to celebrate every milestone and every day moments! From the food to the incredible service, the Bay Cafe is a hidden gem.  Louis, our server, has been an incredible part of our experience for years.  So grateful for his suggestions and ability to accommodate our every need.  Looking forward to our next visit for years to come!

A++! Beautiful area and ambience! Food was amazing. Eggplant parm was off the hook. Penne Ala Vodka and Cesar salad was spectacular. I felt like I was on vacation. Thank you all for making it such a special experience for my father‚Äôs birthday! üíô And Luis was great!

If you‚Äôre looking for a hidden gem with an unbeatable combination of excellent service, delicious food, and great prices, look no further than Bay Caf√© by. This spot truly excels in offering high-quality kosher dishes. The service is top-notch, with attentive and friendly staff making every visit enjoyable. Whether you‚Äôre in the mood for a savory pizza loaded with fresh toppings, perfectly crispy fried bites, or house-made pasta that tastes like a piece of Italy, Bay Caf√© has got you covered. Highly recommended for anyone looking to enjoy a fantastic meal. Definitely a must-visit!

Larisa and her staff are 5 stars. The food and service amazing. We brought cousins who were here visiting from Argentina. The Margherita pizza was delicious,  the Pao de Queijo is gluten free and was so flavorful and soft. Must order kachapuri....they would never find this in their home country and were impressed by the bread , the consistency of the cheese and the runny egg. ( fyi bring lactaid pills for this dish if lactose intolerant, it swims with butter). The Caesar salad with its giant homemade croutons, finely shredded parmesan was refreshing, as was the strawberry hibiscus Boba tea.

What can I say, Daniel is an amazing chef. his food is delicious and unique. From the corn croquettes to the Chilean sea bass and we can't forget the cauliflower soup nor the roasted portabello mushroom, everything was balanced and delicious and made me want more. Finally we can't forget our waiter, Ali who was courteous, patient and personable, wanting our visit to be memorable. Go and be amazed!

Heard a lot of rave reviews about this kosher dairy place and after ordering food from them twice, have to agree that all of these reviews were on point.
Both orders were delivery but everything we ordered was cooked fast, packed extremely carefully and all dishes arrived piping hot and tasting incredibly fresh and delicious.
Portions are big enough to share, food is full of flavor, seasoned superbly and obviously made from premium quality ingredients.
Mushroom & Cheese stuffed baked potato is definitely 1 of the ultimate comfort foods for many and The Bay Cafe‚Äôs  version was a true perfection with lots of yummy melted cheese, great tasting mushrooms mixed in with scooped potatoes insides.
10 out of 10 for sure!
Beets & Quinoa salad was an excellent combo of different fresh veggies, nuts, fruits and feta cheese, resulting in a fabulous mix of sweet and savory plus adding a raspberry vinaigrette as a dressing brought it all to a very satisfying explosion of flavor.
Definitely a Must Get Salad!
Another 10 out of 10.
Lastly we got Maryland style Crab Cakes, made with imitation crab meat but it didn‚Äôt diminish the taste at all.
This dish comes with 2 large pieces of Crab Cakes, served on a bed of fresh arugula and lots of cherry tomatoes with a side of delectable homemade tartar sauce. Crab Cakes were crunchy outside, juicy and tender inside, had a unique taste and was truly amazing.
All in all-very satisfying experience, would love to try more dishes from their vast menu and dine there in person.

There really is only one word to describe our experience at the Bay Cafe and it is Awesome. From the moment we entered to the moment we left everything was perfect. We were there with friends and we ordered various dishes and everything was delicious and fresh. The food in the restaurant is important but so is the service and the staff was fabulous coming around often checking if everything is okay making sure our glasses were full. We got excellent value for our money so put the Bay Cafe on your list.

Delicious dinner with the family at the bay cafe. The Serivce is excellent and the food is amazing. We had fish tacos and chili and chips for appetisers that were super fresh and tasty. Mains were excellent and the desert was to die for. We had bananas foster which they made table side and churos with chocolate and caramel dipping sauces.

Had a date night with hubby and this truly is a perfect place for a romantic and just a pleasant place to enjoy each others company. The staff was meticulous with their service and attentive to our needs. We ordered a quinoa beet salad, BBQ cauliflower, fish tacos as appetizers and each dish was not just beautiful in presentation but delicious with rich flavors. For mains we had the spinach/cheese Ravioli and a Mediterranean Bronzino which I personally could not have asked for more. The Bronzino was so perfectly seasoned, cooked to perfection and the flavors could be tasted in the meat of the fish not just the crispy skin. A def must have when you come here. My new go to location for the perfect date.

The ambiance is very pleasant. The food is excellent and nicely presented. The staff from the front door on in was warm, caring and attentive. They seemed genuinely concerned that everything was perfect. All in all a great experience. Can't wait to go back for more.

I heard a lot of hype about this place so I went to check it out for myself.

Here‚Äôs a breakdown of what we ordered:

Mushroom gnocchi - it was absolutely delicious! Seriously so fresh and tasty, and I can honestly say it was one of the best gnocchi I ever had!

Halloumi salad - it was basic, nothing special.

Lasagna Frittas: this was different and yummy. It came with an Alfredo dipping sauce which elevated it even further and made it heavenly.

Fish tacos - they were ok, the fish had a good crunch but otherwise it was dry. I dipped it into the Alfredo sauce from the frittas and it tasted good like that.

The interior is a bit outdated but overall it‚Äôs a nice ambience and they have good service.

For more kosher reviews on Instagram @kosherfoodworld
This is the 3rd time I have eaten here. The food was always good, but this time, it was great . They have updated Manu in a BIG way, and it will definitely be coming back soon

Incredible food and service. Everything was delivered quickly.
It was fresh, delicious, and the ambiance and paintings were on point. Would 10000% be coming back!!

This place was phenomenal! On top of the amazing food and the cute space (beautiful paintings adorning the walls), our server Luis C. went above and beyond to make sure my husband and I had a great time. The place was crazy busy with two parties going on, but Luis still made time to be attentive to us and just really was amazing. Definitely will be coming back!

First time here and the food was on point.. ordered the beet & quinoa salad - delicious...got the truffle fries and the mushroom gnocchi- amazing...bechamel sauce was tasty and not at all heavy like I've had in other restaurants.  Got their blue lagoon cocktail as well. I will absolutely be coming back..outdoor seating is great- you don't feel like you're in brooklyn. A+

Had an amazing experience here! The food was absolutely delicious, the atmosphere cozy and welcoming. but what really stood out was the service. Lewis went above and beyond to make sure everything was perfect. Super attentive, friendly, and made us feel right at home. He truly made our visit memorable. Highly recommend this place, and make sure to ask for Lewis if you can!

This is by no means a gourmet restaurant, yet everything is very nice and classy. Beautiful presentation. Attentive service. Quiet yet popular on a Thursday night. They have a really nice outdoor seating area! Would be a great place for a first date or to bring friends/family who don‚Äôt often frequent Kosher establishments. I split the ‚Äúcrab cakes‚Äù and the mozzarella sticks with a friend. Crab cakes were a little lackluster (more vegetables than ‚Äúcrab‚Äù) but the mozzarella sticks were yummy. Crab cakes made up for it with a surprise salad which was tasty. My friend ordered fish and felt it was very fresh. A cozy place to chill with friends!
Luis was absolutely amazing the food is incredibly fresh the service is ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è recommend 10/10
The food was fantastic both times we went to eat there. We loved every one of the dishes we ate. The service was fantastic. We had a great time.

Wonderful Experience at The Bay Cafe!

We had such a great time at The Bay Cafe. The food was excellent ‚Äî we ordered the Turbot fish and the Caprese, and both were absolutely amazing. The Caprese, in particular, was so fresh and flavorful. Everything came out quickly, and the service was fantastic ‚Äî super friendly and attentive without being overbearing. And the view of the water just made the whole experience even more relaxing and special. Can‚Äôt wait to come back!

Didn't like the food it was tasteless,
About 25$ for a dairy meal, and 40$ for a fish meal. The service workers aren't kind at all.the place Is empty and u can understand why. Defiantly won't come back

We recently made a party here and everything was perfect! The owner Larissa is very nice and a pleasure to work with! She is very hands on and makes sure that everything is perfect! They put us a lot of food and all the dishes were excellent. Our guests really enjoyed as well. She worked with us on pricing as well and they have available menus for all budgets.

I recently had the pleasure of dining at The Bay Cafe, and it left a memorable impression. The warm, inviting atmosphere makes it a great spot for a family meal, a casual date, or a special night out. The modern decor is paired with subtle touches that create a relaxed yet refined setting.

From the moment I arrived, the attentive service set the tone for the evening. The staff was friendly and knowledgeable, ensuring that all my questions were answered and that I felt welcomed throughout my visit.

The menu, which changes seasonally to highlight fresh ingredients, offers an impressive range of kosher dairy dishes. I began with one of their signature thin-crust pizzas‚Äîa perfect balance of a crispy, flavorful base and a medley of high-quality toppings. For the main course, the Porcini Mushroom Crusted Sea Bass was outstanding; it boasted a beautifully seared exterior and a tender, flaky interior that showcased the chef's dedication to flavor and presentation. Another highlight was the Maple Ginger Glazed Salmon, a dish that cleverly melded sweet and savory notes for a delightful culinary experience.

Overall, The Bay Cafe excels in delivering not just a meal but a complete dining experience. Its commitment to innovative, seasonal cuisine, combined with a welcoming environment and excellent service, makes it a standout destination in Brooklyn. Whether you‚Äôre planning a casual outing or a celebratory dinner, The Bay Cafe is definitely worth a visit.

I could eat here everyday and sometimes I do! Honestly the best spot on all of Emmons and best kosher spot in Brooklyn. Yes, honestly. The staff is extremely welcoming and friendly, and the food is incredible. The prices are 100% fair for‚Ä¶

I recently had the opportunity to dine at this kosher dairy restaurant and unfortunately, it didn't leave a lasting impression on me. The overall taste of the food was below my expectations, especially when it came to my salmon dish. It was overcooked and ended up being dry and hard to enjoy. Additionally, I ordered a matcha drink which was described as slushed, but it ended up being quite watery instead.

Another disappointment was the Greek salad I ordered, which didn't align with what I saw in the Google reviews. It seemed like the dish had undergone some revisions that didn't deliver the same experience as mentioned by others.

The pricing at this restaurant is on the higher side, which didn't seem justified considering the average quality of the food. Overall, my experience here was underwhelming, and I left feeling dissatisfied with both the taste and value for money.

Five stars on the way. This was a fantastic dining experience, we had an excellent server named Luis as well. He was a particularly above and beyond type server. The food was all fresh and delicious and particularly unique. Really enjoyed those little Brazilian cheese balls.Definitely try them!

We held a retirement party for over 20 people on Thursday March 27th. This was the easiest party I have ever planned. Working with Larisa to plan it was a breeze. Everything was set beautifully, staff was superior and the food was not only plentiful but delicious! When over 20 people rave how Everything was perfect you know you have the right place. There was so much food that we sent home with guests. I highly recommend Bay Caf√© for any event you need to celebrate!

We had a late reservation and they did not rush us out and were very polite. Luis was very nice and they made an item for my wife that was off the menu. The owner is a very kin lady and we will definitely be back. The food was phenomenal!!!!
Everything was great! The location is really nice, the food was delicious and the service was good.

The food was delicious and fresh. The ambience was so welcoming and romantic. The astheics was really nice.
Definitely recommend for romantic dinners.
A little noisy. Nice place. The food was great
